note.p: Birth: East Molesey, Surrey, England (02 October 1899)
Career: Reader in Physics in the University of Leeds; Fellow of Emmanuel College, Cambridge
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DSB vol 18 pp 876-877
AssocMaterial: CSAC 6/73. Papers deposited in the Brotherton Library, University of Leeds
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1969 vol 15 pp 201-237, plate, by L F Bates
